name: Face Screaming in Fear
baseMeaning: A yellow face with hands on cheeks and an open mouth, reminiscent of 'The Scream' painting.
tldr: Shows shock, disbelief, or being completely shook. Rarely actual fear.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing shock or disbelief at something unexpected.
Actual fear or horror (less common usage).
